What did you think of the movie?

I didnt watch transformers much untill AFTER the movie.

But still, I do agree that he did screw up transformers, but you gotta admit, he did still make a good movie (and good music ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png))
